Agwu Inobia ma ọ bụ Eze Agwu bụ otu n'ime ndị nna hibere obodo Arochukwu, obodo nke atọ kachasị na Abia State na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Nigeria
Ọ bụ onye-ọkpụkpụ dị ike na onye ndú nke ezinụlọ ya
Eze Agwu ka a na-asi na o bu nwa nna Uru
Nna Uru so na ndi malitere agbataobi obodo Abiriba na ndi Edda
Omenala Edda na Abiriba kwuru na ndị nna nna ha tọrọ Arochukwu.
Ezinụlọ Eze Agwu biri n'ebe a na-akpọ Amanagwu city-state ugbu a
Dị ka ndị ọbịa ọhụrụ, ndị ọchịchị obodo Obong Okon Ita gbochiri ndị Eze Agwu nke mere ka agha Aro-Ibibio malite
Agha ahụ ghọrọ ihe na-adịghị mma na mbụ
Otu abụọ ahụ haziri alụmdi na nwunye n'etiti eze Obong Okon Ita na otu nwanyị si n'agbụrụ Eze Agwu iji gbalịsie ike ibi n'udo
Alụmdi na nwunye ahụ mechara kwụsị iweta udo ma mesịa keere òkè dị mkpa n'agha ahụ.
Eze Agwu Inobia kpọkuru ụkọchukwu Nnachi sitere na otu Edda ka o nyere ya aka imebi ọgbaghara ahụ wee merie n'agha
Mgbe o rutere, Nnachi na Eze Agwu jikọrọ aka na Prince Akakpokpo Okon of the Ibibio Kingdom of Obong Okon Ita
Akakpokpo Okon bụ nwa n'alụmdi na nwunye dị n'etiti ụmụnwaanyị Igbo nke Eze Obong Okon Ita
Ndị otu Eze Agwu/Nnachi kpebiri inyere Akakpokpo aka ịgbalị ịkwatu nwanne ya nwoke bụ eze Akpan Okon wee gbanarị ọchịchị mgbagha ahụ nke ukwuu
Nnachi kpọkuru otu Eastern Cross River nke a na-akpọ Akpa maka enyemaka
A na-ekwu na Akpa ahụ nwere egbe ma na-ekwu maka iwebata egbe agha na mpaghara ahụ
Princes Osim na Akuma Nnubi duuru ndị agha Akpa nyere aka ịlụso ndị Ibibios ọgụ
Njikọ dị n'etiti Eze Agwu, Nnachi, Akakpokpo Okon, na Akpa mechara merie ndị agha Obong Okon Ita (1690–1720) n'okpuru ọchịchị Osim Nnubi
N'ihi agha Aro-Ibibio, njikọ aka ahụ hiwere alaeze Arochukwu
Akuma Nnubi ka chiri eze Arochukwu n'okwa nwanne ya nwoke Osim Nnubi nke nwuru n'oge agha biri
Prince Akakpokpo die and the Ulu Okon dynasty was assimilated into the Eze Agwu lineage.Prince Akakpokpo died and the Ulu Okon dynasty was assimilated into the Eze Agwu lineage.
